entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
